sentences.text: AUDIT COMMITTEE REPORT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee of the Newfield Board of Directors consists of the four directors whose names appear below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each member of the Audit Committee is independent as defined in the NYSEs listing standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The primary purposes of the Audit Committee are to assist the Board in monitoring:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the integrity of Newfields financial statements and financial reporting processes and systems of internal control;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the qualifications and independence of Newfields independent auditors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the performance of Newfields internal audit function and independent auditors; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Newfields compliance with legal and regulatory requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee is responsible for appointing, retaining and terminating Newfields independent auditors and also performs the specific functions set forth in its charter which include ensuring execution and compliance of the Internal Audit Charter, reviewing the activities, structure and reports of internal audit, including the scope thereof, and obtaining assurances from management and internal audit that Newfield is in conformity with applicable legal requirements and Newfield policies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee held seven meetings in person or by telephone conference during 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The meetings were designed to facilitate and encourage communication between the Audit Committee and Newfields internal auditors and independent auditors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP, Newfields independent auditors who report directly to the Audit Committee, is responsible for performing an independent audit of Newfields consolidated financial statements in accordance with generally accepted auditing standards and issuing a report thereon.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management is responsible for Newfields internal control over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP is also responsible for performing an independent audit of Newfields internal control over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has reviewed and discussed with Newfields management and PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP, Newfields independent auditors, the audited financial statements of Newfield included in its Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has also discussed the financial statements with PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP with and without Newfields management present.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has discussed with Newfields independent auditors all communications required by the auditing standards of the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (PCAOB), including those required by the PCAOBs Auditing Standard 1301, Communication with Audit Committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee also has received and reviewed the written disclosures and the letter from PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP required by applicable requirements of the PCAOB regarding the independent auditors communications with the Audit Committee concerning independence, and has discussed those matters with PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee also has considered whether the provision of non-audit services to Newfield by PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP is compatible with maintaining their independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on the review and discussions referred to above, the Audit Committee recommended to Newfields Board of Directors that the audited financial statements be included in Newfields Annual Report on Form 10- K for the year ended December 31, 2016, filed with the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This report is submitted on behalf of the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thomas G. Ricks, Chair Pamela J. Gardner Roger B. Plank J. Terry Strange
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The foregoing Audit Committee Report is not soliciting material, is not deemed filed with the SEC and is not to be incorporated by reference in any filing by Newfield under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, or the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended, whether made before or after the date hereof and irrespective of any general incorporation language in any such filing.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The audit fees for 2015 and 2016 were for professional services rendered in connection with the audits of our consolidated financial statements and reviews of our quarterly consolidated financial statements within such years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These fees also include the issuance of comfort letters, consents and assistance with review of various documents filed with the SEC in those years.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee reviews and pre-approves all audit and non-audit services, including tax services, performed by our independent auditors, as well as the fees charged for these services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee may delegate pre-approval authority for these services to one or more members, whose decisions are then presented to the full Audit Committee at its next scheduled meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In its review of all non-audit service fees, the Audit Committee considers, among
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: other things, the possible effect of these services on the independence of our independent auditors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The services described in the above table were pre- approved by the Audit Committee in 2015 and 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Newfield Exploration Company  2017 PROXY STATEMENT    54
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
