sentences.text: Proposal 7: Approval of the Newfield Exploration Company Amended and Restated 2010 Employee Stock Purchase Plan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Background of Proposal
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company originally established the Newfield Exploration Company 2010 Employee Stock Purchase Plan (the ESPP), which was approved by the Companys stockholders on May 7, 2010, to be effective July 1, 2010.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Certain non-material amendments to the ESPP were subsequently adopted in February 2014.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The ESPP is designed to provide our eligible employees and those of participating related subsidiary corporations with the opportunity to purchase shares of our common stock on periodic purchase dates through their accumulated payroll deductions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As such, the ESPP is intended to align the interests of our employees with those of our stockholders by encouraging employees to invest in our common stock, and to help our employees share in Newfields success through the appreciation in value of such purchased stock and serves as an important employee retention and recruitment vehicle, which contributes to our long-term growth strategies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In March 2017, the Compensation Committee determined, and the Board subsequently determined, that it is in our best interests to amend and restate the ESPP, effective May 16, 2017 (the Amended and Restated ESPP), subject to stockholder approval at the Annual Meeting, to increase the maximum number of shares that may be made available for sale thereunder by 2,000,000 shares and to increase administrative flexibility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, this proposal seeks approval of the reservation of up to 2,000,000 additional shares for purchase under the Amended and Restated ESPP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When the ESPP was originally adopted and approved by our stockholders in May 2010, the ESPP had a maximum number of shares available for sale of 1,000,000 shares of common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of March 20, 2017, an aggregate of 120,165 shares of common stock remained available for future issuance under the ESPP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We estimate that, with an increase of 2,000,000 shares, we will have a sufficient number of shares of common stock to cover purchases under the Amended and Restated ESPP through 2030.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The closing market price of Newfields common stock as of March 20, 2017 was $34.51 per share, as reported on the NYSE.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Amended and Restated ESPP is included as Appendix B to this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Amended and Restated ESPP will not become effective unless approved by our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Description of the Material Terms of the Amended and Restated ESPP
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following is a description of the principal features of the Amended and Restated ESPP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This description does not purport to be a complete description of all of the provisions of the Amended and Restated ESPP and is qualified in its entirety by reference to the full text of the Amended and Restated ESPP included in Appendix B to this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Capitalized terms used in this description, but not otherwise defined, have the meanings given to them in the Amended and Restated ESPP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Administration
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Subject to oversight by the Board or the Compensation Committee, a committee of officers and employees of the Company appointed by the Compensation  Committee (the Administrative Committee) has the authority and responsibility to administer the Amended and Restated ESPP, to determine all questions under the Amended and Restated ESPP and to make and adopt rules and regulations not inconsistent with the provisions of the Amended and Restated ESPP or of the Internal Revenue Code (the Code).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Decisions made by the Administrative Committee shall be final and binding on all persons, other than with respect to Newfield, unless determined by a final judgment of a court having jurisdiction to have been arbitrary and capricious.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares Available and Limitations on Share Issuances
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There is a maximum of 3,000,000 shares of the Companys common stock reserved for purchase under the Amended and Restated ESPP (since its original inception in 2010).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The shares of common stock authorized to be sold pursuant to Options granted under the Amended and Restated ESPP may be
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) authorized but unissued shares,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) shares held in treasury or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) previously issued shares reacquired by us including shares bought on the open market or otherwise.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In computing the number of shares available for the grant of Options, any shares relating to Options that subsequently lapse, are cancelled or are otherwise not exercised by the Exercise Date shall be available for future grants of Options.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The maximum number of shares of common stock that may be issued to a Participant during any single Offering Period is 5,000 shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No Employee may be granted an Option under the Amended and Restated ESPP if, immediately after the grant, such Employees right to purchase common stock under all Qualified Employee Stock Purchase Plans of Newfield and any related corporation would accrue at a rate which exceeds $25,000 in Fair Market Value of such common stock (determined at the time such purchase right is granted) for each calendar year in which such purchase right would be outstanding at any time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Newfield Exploration Company  2017 PROXY STATEMENT    65
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Back to Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eligibility
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each common law employee of Newfield, or of any of its parent or subsidiary corporations that have been selected for participation in an applicable Offering (a Participating Corporation), is eligible to participate in a given Offering if the individual is employed by Newfield or a Participating Corporation on the first day of such Offering Period (the Grant Date).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless the Administrative Committee specifies otherwise in writing with respect to a given Offering, the following categories of persons are excluded from participation:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Employees who customarily work 20 hours or less per week;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Employees who are customarily employed for five months or less in any calendar year; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Employees who are residents of a foreign jurisdiction if the grant of an Option under the Offering to a resident or citizen of such jurisdiction is prohibited by the laws of such jurisdiction or if compliance with such jurisdictions laws would cause the Offering to violate the requirements of Section 423 of the Code.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Administrative Committee may also specify in writing to exclude one or more of the following categories of employees from participation in any Offering provided each exclusion is applied in an identical manner to all employees of Newfield and the Participating Corporations:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Employees employed less than two years; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Employees who are Highly Compensated Employees (or a designated segment thereof with compensation above a certain level) or who are Section 16 officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No employee may participate in the Amended and Restated ESPP to the extent such employee, immediately after a Grant Date, would be deemed for purposes of Section 423(b)(3) of the Code to possess 5% or more of the outstanding stock or total combined voting power of all stock of Newfield or of any parent or subsidiary corporation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of March 20, 2017, we had approximately 950 employees eligible to participate in the Amended and Restated ESPP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Offering Periods; Option Price
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Amended and Restated ESPP operates by a series of consecutive Offering Periods of six months in duration commencing on January 1 and July 1; however, the Administrative Committee may change the duration and frequency of future Offering Periods (subject to a maximum Offering Period of twenty- seven (27) months) and/or the start and end dates of future Offering Periods.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On each Exercise Date, which is the last Trading Day of each Offering Period, the amount in a Participants Account is charged with the aggregate Option Price of the largest number of shares, excluding fractional shares, which can be purchased with such amount, subject to the limitations of the Amended and Restated ESPP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The balance, if any, is refunded to the Participant without interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Option Price per share of the common stock sold to Participants under the Amended and Restated ESPP is the lesser of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) 85% of the Fair Market Value of such share on the Grant Date and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) 85% of the Fair Market Value of such share on the Exercise Date, but in no event is the Option Price less than the par value of the common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Payroll Deductions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Payment for shares of common stock purchased under the Amended and Restated ESPP with respect to a given Offering are made by authorized payroll deductions from each regular payment of Base Compensation in accordance with instructions received from a Participant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Participant may authorize payroll deductions from his or her paycheck in an amount equal to at least 1% but not more than 75% of Base Compensation (or such other maximum percentage as the Administrative Committee may establish for an Offering Period).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Participant may discontinue or modify the deduction in accordance with procedures established by the Administrative Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any amount remaining in the Participants Account after the purchase of shares is refunded without interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any Participant who discontinues payroll deductions during an Offering Period may again become a Participant for a subsequent Offering Period by re-authorizing payroll deductions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Transferability
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Rights to purchase shares under the Amended and Restated ESPP are exercisable only by the Participant and are not transferable other than by will or the laws of descent and distribution.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Withdrawal from the Amended and Restated ESPP
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Participant may withdraw from the Amended and Restated ESPP at any time on or before 15 days prior to the Exercise Date for the applicable Offering Period by filing notice in accordance with procedures established by the Administrative Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon withdrawal, the entire amount, if any, in a Participants Account will be refunded to him without interest and the Participants right to exercise an Option on the Exercise Date will be terminated for the applicable Offering Period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a Participants employment is terminated prior to any Exercise Date, the Participants right to exercise an Option on that Exercise Date will be terminated for the applicable Offering Period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Newfield Exploration Company  2017 PROXY STATEMENT    66
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Back to Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Adjustments
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event that adjustments are made in the number of outstanding shares of common stock or such shares are exchanged for a different class of Newfield stock or for shares of stock of any other corporation by reason of merger, consolidation, stock dividend, stock split or otherwise, appropriate adjustments will be made to
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the total number of shares of stock reserved for purchase under the Amended and Restated ESPP,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the number of shares of stock subject to each outstanding Option, and/or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) the Option Price applicable to each outstanding Option.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Compensation Committee may, in its sole discretion, provide for
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) the acceleration of the Exercise Date of outstanding Options or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) the conversion of outstanding Options into cash or other property upon the completion of such transactions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Amendment, Suspension and Termination
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board or the Compensation Committee may at any time, or from time to time, terminate, amend or suspend the Amended and Restated ESPP in any respect, except that, without approval of the stockholders, no amendment may increase the aggregate number of shares reserved under the Amended and Restated ESPP other than as provided therein, materially increase the benefits accruing to Participants or materially modify the requirements as to eligibility for participation in the Amended and Restated ESPP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any amendment of the Amended and Restated ESPP must be made in accordance with applicable provisions of the Code and/or any regulations issued thereunder, any other applicable law or regulations, and the requirements of the principal exchange upon which the common stock is listed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Amended and Restated ESPP shall automatically terminate upon the purchase by Participants of all shares of common stock committed to the Amended and Restated ESPP, unless the number of shares so committed is increased by the Board and approved by stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Amended and Restated ESPP will continue in effect until terminated in accordance with the terms of the Amended and Restated ESPP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon any such termination, the balance in any Participants account will be refunded to such Participant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Certain United States Federal Income Tax Aspects
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following discussion is for general information only and is intended to summarize briefly the U.S. federal income tax consequences arising from participation in the Amended and Restated ESPP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This description is based on current law, which is subject to change (possibly retroactively).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This summary does not address the tax considerations under foreign, state and local, estate and gift tax laws, and such tax laws may not correspond to the federal income tax treatment described herein.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The exact income tax treatment of a Participants transactions under the Amended and Restated ESPP may vary depending on the specific circumstances of the Participant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Participants are advised to consult their personal tax advisors with regard to all consequences arising from the grant or exercise of Options and the disposition of any acquired shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Amended and Restated ESPP, and the right of Participants to make purchases thereunder, is intended to qualify as an employee stock purchase plan under Sections 421 and 423 of the Code.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Participants payroll deductions to purchase stock under the Amended and Restated ESPP are not excluded from gross income, and the Participant is taxed on such amounts when earned.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If certain employment requirements are satisfied, an employee who is granted a right, or option, to purchase stock under such a plan will not be subject to federal income tax, and we will not be entitled to any deduction, either at the time of the grant or the time of the exercise of such right.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The disposition of the shares, however, will result in some amount of ordinary income and capital gain to a Participant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The amount of ordinary income versus capital gain a Participant will recognize depends upon satisfaction of a holding period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To satisfy the holding period, a Participant must hold the shares purchased for a period of two years after the Grant Date or a period of one year after the Exercise Date, whichever is later.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the holding period is met, no taxable income results if the proceeds of the sale are equal to or less than the Option Price paid for the shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, if the proceeds of the sale are higher than the Option Price, a Participant will generally recognize ordinary income for the year in which the sale occurs equal to the lesser of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) fifteen percent (15%) of the Fair Market Value of the common stock on the Grant Date, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) the excess of the proceeds of the sale over the Option Price.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Participant may recognize long-term capital gain or loss in an amount equal to the difference between the proceeds of the sale and the Participants basis in the shares (i.e., the Participants Option Price plus the amount taxed to the Participant as ordinary income).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No deduction is allowed to Newfield.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the holding period is not met, the Participant will recognize ordinary income equal to the difference between the Fair Market Value of the shares on the Exercise Date and the Participants Option Price.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This amount is reportable as ordinary income even if no profit was realized on the sale of shares or the shares were sold at a loss.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Long-term or short-term (depending on the holding period for the shares) capital gain or loss will be recognized in an amount equal to the difference between the proceeds of sale and the Participants basis in the shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Participant will receive long-term capital gain or loss treatment if he or she has held the shares for at least 12 months.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The amount reportable as ordinary income if the holding period is not satisfied will generally be allowed as a tax deduction to Newfield.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The final regulations under Section 409A of the Code provide that the grant of an option under an employee stock purchase plan (described in Section 423 of the Code) does not constitute a deferral of compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, the interest and penalty provisions of Section 409A of the Code should not apply to the Amended and Restated ESPP so long as the Amended and Restated ESPP satisfies Section 423 of the Code.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The foregoing brief summary of the effect of federal income taxation upon the Participants and Newfield with respect to the purchase of shares under the Amended and Restated ESPP does not purport to be complete, and reference should be made to the applicable provisions of the Code.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, this summary does not discuss any tax consequences of a Participants death.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: New Plan Benefits
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because the amount of contributions to be set aside to purchase shares of common stock under the Amended and Restated ESPP, subject to the limitations therein, is within the discretion of each Participant, it is not possible to determine the benefits or amounts that will be received by or allocated to eligible employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Where and when is the Annual Meeting?

sentences.text: The Annual Meeting will be held at 8:00 a.m.

sentences.text: If you wish to vote or ask a question during the meeting, you will need the 12-digit control number provided on the Notice or your proxy card.

sentences.text: Could matters be decided at the Annual Meeting that arent covered in this Proxy Statement?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are not aware of any matters that will be considered at the Annual Meeting other than those set forth in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, if any othe matters arise at the Annual Meeting, the persons named in your proxy will vote in accordance with their best judgment or the Boards recommendation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting by Direct Stockholders
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who is entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders of record at the close of business on March 20, 2017, the record date for the meeting, are entitled to receive notice of, and to vote at, the Annual Meeting or any adjournments or postponements thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are entitled to one vote for each share of our common stock that you owned as of the record date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may not cumulate votes in the election of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On the record date, we had 198,966,370 shares of our common stock outstanding and entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What constitutes a quorum?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The presence at the Annual Meeting, in person or by proxy, of the holders of a majority of our issued and outstanding shares of common stock entitled to vote will constitute a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under Delaware law, abstentions are treated as present and entitled to vote and thus will be counted in determining whether a quorum is present.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, broker non-votes (described below) will be considered present for quorum purposes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There are four ways to vote:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: INTERNET
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: TELEPHONE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MAIL
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MEETING
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Call 1-800-690-6903 and follow the instructions on the Notice, or if you received a proxy card, follow the instructions on the proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Telephone voting facilities  for  stockholders  of record will be available 24 hours a day and will close at 11:59 p.m. (Eastern Daylight Time) on May 15, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received a proxy card by mail, you can complete, sign, date and return it in the postage- paid envelope provided.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your proxy card is returned unsigned, your vote cannot be counted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your  proxy  card  is  signed without indicating how to vote, your proxy will be voted as recommended by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your  proxy  card  must  be received by May 15, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Visit http://www.proxyvote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: com, the website for Internet voting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Follow the instructions on the Notice, or if you received a proxy card by mail, follow the instructions on the proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Internet  voting  facilities  for stockholders of record will be available 24 hours a day and will close at 11:59 p.m. (Eastern Daylight Time) on May 15, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote at the Annual Meeting online through the link www.virtualshareholdermeeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: com/NFX2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The  12-digit control number provided on your Notice  or  proxy  card  is necessary to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We urge you to vote prior to the meeting by one of the other three methods.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Newfield Exploration Company  2017 PROXY STATEMENT    69
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Back to Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold your Newfield shares in a brokerage account, your ability to vote over the Internet or by telephone depends on your brokers voting process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please follow the directions on your proxy card or the voter instruction card from your broker carefully.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your Newfield shares are held in Newfields 401(k) Plan, then your vote must be received by 11:59 p.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eastern Daylight Time on May 14, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The plan administrator will direct the trustee to vote shares as to which no instructions are received in proportion to voting directions received from all plan participants who vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board recommends that you vote online, by telephone, or by mail in advance of the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Can I change my vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may revoke or change a proxy before the vote is taken at the Annual Meeting by:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: giving notice of the revocation in writing to our Corporate Secretary at 4 Waterway Square Place, Suite 100, The Woodlands, Texas 77380;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: submitting another valid proxy with a later date, either by mail (properly signed), or by telephone or over the Internet (by 11:59 p.m. Eastern Daylight Time on May 15, 2017);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: voting at the Annual Meeting through the link www.virtualshareholdermeeting.com/NFX2017; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: if you have instructed your broker or other nominee to vote your shares, by following the directions provided by that agent for changing those instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in our 401(k) Plan, you may revoke or change your proxy by one of the foregoing methods, except that your new 401(k) Pla participant proxy must be received by 11:59 p.m. (Eastern Daylight Time) on May 14, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If I vote by telephone or Internet and received a proxy card in the mail, do I need to return my proxy card?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Can I vote my stock by filling out and returning the Notice?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice merely provides instructions on how to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is not a formal proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the effect of an advisory vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your votes with respect to the ratification of PricewaterhouseCoopers, the approval of our executive compensation, and the determination of the frequency with which future say-on-pay votes will be held are advisory.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Those votes will not be binding upon the Board or its committees, but the relevant committees will take the outcome of the advisory votes into account when considering future executive compensation arrangements, determining the frequency of future say-on-pay advisory votes and evaluating Newfields independent auditor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting by Brokers and Other Representatives
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the difference between a stockholder of record and a stockholder who holds stock in street name?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are registered in your name at American Stock Transfer & Trust Company, LLC, you are a stockholder of record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are registered at American Stock Transfer & Trust Company, LLC in the name of a broker, bank, trustee, nominee, or other similar stockholder of record, your shares are held in street name and you are the beneficial owner of the shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is a broker non-vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) permits brokers to vote their customers stock held in street name on routine matters when the brokers have not received voting instructions from their customers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Brokers may not vote stock held in street name on non-routine matters unless they have received voting instructions from their customers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a broker does not receive voting instructions in a non-routine matter, the uninstructed shares are called broker non-votes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Uninstructed shares are considered present for purposes of determining whether there is a quorum to hold the Annual Meeting, but will not affect the outcome of the vote on any non-routine matter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Newfield Exploration Company  2017 PROXY STATEMENT    70
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Back to Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Which matters to be considered at the Annual Meeting are non-routine and which are routine?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There are six non-routine matters to be considered at the Annual Meeting: election of directors, the advisory vote on our executive compensation program, the advisory vote on the frequency of future say-on-pay votes, approval of the 2017 Plan, approval of the material terms of the 2017 Plan to comply with the stockholder approval requirements of Section 162(m) of the Internal Revenue Code and approval of the Amended and Restated ESPP to authorize additional shares for issuance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Brokers may vote on these six matters only if they have received voting instructions from their customers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The ratification of the independent auditor is a routine matter on which brokers may vote in their discretion on behalf of customers who have not provided voting instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy Solicitation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is a proxy?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A proxy is your legal designation of another person, called a proxy holder, to vote the shares that you own.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have designated Lawrence S. Massaro, Executive Vice President and CFO, Timothy D. Yang, General Counsel and Corporate Secretary, and Benjamin J. Paul, Senior Legal Counsel and Assistant Corporate Secretary, to act as proxy holders at the Annual Meeting as to all shares for which proxies are returned or voting instructions are provided by Internet or telephonic voting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who is soliciting my vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board is soliciting your vote for the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who pays for the proxy solicitation related to the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will bear the entire cost of this solicitation, including preparing, assembling, printing, and mailing of the Notice and any mailing of this Proxy Statement, the proxy, and any additional information furnished to stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to using the mail, proxies may be solicited by directors, executive officers, and other employees of Newfield, in person or by telephone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No additional compensation will be paid to our directors, executive officers, or other employees for these services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You also may be solicited by means of press releases issued by Newfield, postings on our website at http://www.newfield.com, or other media forms.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have retained Georgeson Inc. to assist us with the solicitation of proxies for an estimated fee of $7,500 plus expenses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Georgeson ensures that brokers, custodians and nominees will supply additional copies of the proxy materials for distribution to beneficial owners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also will reimburse banks, nominees, fiduciaries, brokers and other custodians for their costs of sending the proxy materials to beneficial owners of our common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy Materials
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is householding?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have adopted a procedure approved by the SEC known as householding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under this procedure, multiple stockholders residing at the same address will receive a single copy of our Annual Report and Proxy Statement, or the Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials, unless they have notified us that they want to receive multiple copies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Householding allows us to reduce the environmental impact of providing proxy materials as well as printing and mailing costs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received a householded mailing this year and you would like to have additional copies of the Annual Report, Proxy Statement and/or the Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials mailed to you, or you would like to revoke your consent to householding for future documents, please contact Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc., either by calling 1-866-540-7095 or by writing to Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc., Householding Department, 51 Mercedes Way, Edgewood, New York 11717.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broadridge or Newfield will promptly deliver any additional copies requested.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you would like to enroll in householding, please contact Broadridge as described above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Householding for bank and brokerage accounts is limited to accounts within the same bank or brokerage firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, if you have accounts containing our common stock at more than one brokerage firm, you will receive a copy of our Annual Meeting materials from each firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To avoid receiving duplicate sets of printed materials, you may wish to enroll some or all of your accounts in our electronic delivery program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How can I access the proxy materials over the Internet?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your Notice or proxy card will contain instructions on how to view our proxy materials for the Annual Meeting on the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our proxy materials are also available on our website at: http://www.newfield.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Newfield Exploration Company  2017 PROXY STATEMENT    71
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Back to Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Why did I receive a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials instead of a full set of proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with SEC rules, we are providing access to our proxy materials over the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, we have sent to most of our stockholders a Notice nstead of a paper copy of the proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice contains instructions on how to access the proxy materials over the Internet and how to request a paper copy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, you may request to receive future proxy materials in printed form by mail or electronically by e-mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your election to receive proxy materials by mail or e-mail will remain in effect until you terminate it.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Why didnt I receive a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are providing certain stockholders, including those who have previously requested paper copies of the proxy materials, with a full set of printed proxy materials instead of a Notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you would like to help reduce the costs we incur in mailing proxy materials, you can consent to receive all future proxy statements, proxy cards and annual reports electronically via e-mail or using the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To sign up for electronic delivery, please follow the instructions provided with your proxy materials and on your proxy card or voting instruction card to vote using the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When prompted, indicate that you agree to receive or access stockholder communications electronically in the future.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additional Information Available
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For stockholders receiving paper copies of this Proxy Statement, a copy of our Annual Report for the year ended December 31, 2016 (which includes our Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 2016) will accompany the Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For stockholders receiving notice only, the Proxy Statement and our 2016 Annual Report will be available electronically.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Copies of our Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 2016, as filed with the SEC, are also available on our website (http://www.newfield.com) or you may request a copy of the Annual Report on Form 10-K (without exhibits) and/or the Proxy Statement, without charge, by writing to our Investor Relations Department at 4 Waterway Square Place, Suite 100, The Woodlands, Texas 77380.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: None of the information contained in our Annual Report is proxy solicitation material.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Meeting Voting Results
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who will tabulate and certify the vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc., an independent third party, will tabulate and certify the vote, and will have a representative to act as the independent inspector of elections for the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Where can I find the voting results of the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will announce the preliminary voting results at the Annual Meeting and disclose the final voting results in a Current Report on Form 8-K filed with the SEC within four business days of the date of the Annual Meeting or, if later, within four business days after the final voting results are known.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may access this report free of charge on our website at http://www.newfield.com, by contacting our Investor Relations Department at 281-210-5321, or on the SECs website at http://www.sec.gov.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholder List
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A complete list of stockholders of record entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting will be available for viewing during ordinary business hours for a period of ten days before the Annual Meeting at our offices at 4 Waterway Square Place, Suite 100, The Woodlands, Texas 77380.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The list of stockholders will also be available for stockholders during the Annual Meeting through the link www.virtualshareholdermeeting.com/NFX2017.

sentences.text: Stockholder Proposals for 2018 Annual Meeting and Director Nominations
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Nominees for Inclusion in Next Years Proxy Statement (Proxy Access)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board recently amended our Bylaws to permit a stockholder (or a group of no more than 20 stockholders) who has maintained continuous qualifying ownership of at least 3% of our outstanding common stock as of the date of giving notice (as set forth in our Bylaws) and has complied with the othe equirements set forth in our Bylaws, to submit director nominees (which shall not exceed the greater of two or 20% of the number of directors in office as o he last day on which a stockholders notice of such nomination (as set forth in our Bylaws) may be delivered) for inclusion in our proxy statement along with he candidates nominated by the Board if the stockholder(s) and the nominee(s) satisfy the requirements set forth in our Bylaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notice of director nominees submitted under these Bylaw provisions must be received at our principal executive offices, located at 4 Waterway Square Place, Suite 100, The Woodlands Texas 77380, Attn: Corporate Secretary, no earlier than the close of business 150 days, nor later than 120 days, prior to the first anniversary of the date the definitive proxy statement was first sent to stockholders in connection with the preceding years annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based upon the anniversary date of ou Companys issuance of the Proxy Statement for the 2017 Annual Meeting, a stockholder or stockholders must send advance written notice of such nominations such that the notice is received by us not earlier than the close of business on October 30, 2017 and no later than the close of business on November 29, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notice must include all information required by our Bylaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Nominees and Other Stockholder Proposals Not for Inclusion in Next Years Proxy Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under our Bylaws, and as SEC regulations permit, you must follow certain procedures to nominate a person for election as a director or to introduce an item o business at a meeting of our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Specifically, you must submit the proposed nominee or item of business by delivering notice to our Corporate Secretary at our principal executive offices at the address set forth above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For our 2018 Annual Meeting, we must receive such notice between January 16 2018, and February 15, 2018.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If circumstances change and we do not hold the 2018 Annual Meeting in May as we currently expect, any notice must be received by the later of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) 75 days before the Annual Meeting and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) 10 days after the day on which public announcement of the date of the meeting is firs made.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If we hold a special meeting, we must receive the notice by the later of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) 75 days before the special meeting and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) 10 days after the day on which public announcement of the date of the meeting is first made.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The notice is required to contain certain information set forth in our Bylaws about the nominee or the proposed business, as applicable, and the stockholder making the nomination or proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will disregard any nomination or proposal that does not comply with these requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Appendix A: Newfield Exploration Company 2017 Omnibus Incentive Plan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. Purpose.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The purpose of the Newfield Exploration Company 2017 Omnibus Incentive Plan (the Plan) is to provide a means through which
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) Newfield Exploration Company, a Delaware corporation (the Company), and its Affiliates may attract and retain able persons as employees, directors and consultants, thereby enhancing the profitable growth of the Company and its Affiliates and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) persons upon whom the responsibilities of the successful administration and management of the Company and its Affiliates rest, and whose present and potential contributions to the welfare of the Company and its Affiliates are of importance, can acquire and maintain stock ownership or awards the value of which is tied to the performance of the Company, thereby strengthening their concern for the welfare of the Company and its Affiliates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, the Plan provides for the grant of Options, SARs, Restricted Stock, Restricted Stock Units, Stock Awards, Dividend Equivalents, Other Stock-Based Awards, Cash Awards, Substitute Awards, Performance Awards, or any combination of the foregoing.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. Definitions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For purposes of the Plan, the following terms shall be defined as set forth below:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) Affiliate means any corporation, partnership, limited liability company, limited liability partnership, association, trust or other organization that, directly or indirectly, controls, is controlled by, or is under common control with, the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For purposes of the preceding sentence, control (including, with correlative meanings, the terms controlled by and under common control with), as used with respect to any entity or organization, shall mean the possession, directly or indirectly, of the power
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) to vote more than 50% of the securities having ordinary voting power for the election of directors of the controlled entity or organization, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) to direct or cause the direction of the management and policies of the controlled entity or organization, whether through the ownership of voting securities, by contract, or otherwise.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) ASC Topic 718 means the Financial Accounting Standards Board Accounting Standards Codification Topic 718, Compensation Stock Compensation, as amended or any successor accounting standard.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: c) Award means any Option, SAR, Restricted Stock Award, Restricted Stock Unit, Stock Award, Dividend Equivalent, Other Stock-Based Award, Cash Award, Substitute Award or Performance Award, together with any other right or interest, granted under the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: d) Award Agreement means any written instrument (including any employment, severance or change in control agreement) that sets forth the terms, conditions, restrictions and/or limitations applicable to an Award, in addition to those set forth under the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (e) Board means the Board of Directors of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (f) Cash Award means an Award denominated in cash granted under Section 6(i).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (g) Change in Control means, except as otherwise provided in an Award Agreement, the occurrence of one of the following events:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the Company is not the surviving person in any merger, consolidation or other reorganization (or survives only as a subsidiary of another person);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the consummation of a merger or consolidation of the Company with another person and as a result of such merger or consolidation less than fifty percent (50%) of the outstanding voting securities of the surviving or resulting corporation will be issued in respect of the capital stock of the Company;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) the Company sells, leases or exchanges all or substantially all of its assets to any other person;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) the Company is to be dissolved and liquidated;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (v) any person, including a group as contemplated by Section 13(d)(3) of the Exchange Act, acquires or gains ownership or control (including the power to vote) of more than fifty percent (50%) of the outstanding shares of the Companys voting stock (based upon voting power); or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (vi) individuals who are Incumbent Directors cease for any reason to constitute a majority of the Board
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notwithstanding the foregoing, (A) the definition of Change in Control shall not include any merger, consolidation, other reorganization, sale, lease, exchange, or similar transaction involving solely the Company and one or more persons that were wholly owned, directly or indirectly, by the Company immediately prior to such event; and (B) for purposes of an Award that provides for a deferral of compensation under the Nonqualified Deferred Compensation Rules, to the extent necessary so that the impact of a Change in Control on such Award would not subject a Participant to additional taxes under the Nonqualified Deferred Compensation Rules, a Change in Control for purposes of such Award will mean both a Change in Control and a change in the ownership of a corporation, change in the effective control of a corporation, or change in the ownership of a substantial portion of a corporations assets within the meaning of the Nonqualified Deferred Compensation Rules as applied to the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: h) Change in Control Price means the amount determined in the following clause
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii),
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii),
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (v), whichever the Committee determines is applicable, as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the price per share offered to holders of Stock in any merger or consolidation,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the per share fair market value of the Stock immediately before the Change in Control or other event without regard to assets sold in the Change in Control or other event and assuming the Company has received the consideration paid for the assets in the case of a sale of the assets,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) the amount distributed per share of Stock in a dissolution transaction,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) the price per share offered to holders of Stock in any tender offer or exchange offer whereby a Change in Control or other event takes place, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (v) if such Change in Control or other event occurs other than pursuant to a transaction described in clauses
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii),
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii), or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) of this Section 2
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (h), the value per share of the Stock that may otherwise be obtained with respect to such Awards or to which such Awards track, as determined by the Committee in its sole discretion as of the date determined by the Committee to be the date of cancellation and surrender of such Awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event that the consideration offered to stockholders of the Company in any transaction described in this Section 2
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (h) or in Section 8(e) consists of anything other than cash, the Committee shall determine in its sole discretion the fair
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: cash equivalent of the portion of the consideration offered which is other than cash and such determination shall be binding on all affected Participants to the extent applicable to Awards held by such Participants.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: be designated by the Board to administer the Plan; provided, however, that, unless otherwise determined by the Board, the Committee shall consist solely of two or more Qualified Members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: k) Covered Employee means an Eligible Person who is designated by the Committee, at the time of grant of a Performance Award, as likely to be a covered employee within the meaning of Section 162(m) for a specified fiscal year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: l) Dividend Equivalent means a right, granted to an Eligible Person under Section 6(g), to receive cash, Stock, other Awards or other property equal in value to dividends paid with respect to a specified number of shares of Stock, or other periodic payments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (m) Effective Date means May 16, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (n) Eligible Person means any individual who, as of the date of grant of an Award, is an officer or employee of the Company or of any of its Affiliates, and any other person who provides services to the Company or any of its Affiliates, including directors of the Company; provided, that, any such individual must be an employee of the Company or any of its parents or subsidiaries within the meaning of General Instruction A.1(a) to Form S-8 if such individual is granted an Award that may be settled in Stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the avoidance of doubt and as required by Form S-8, in the case of any Eligible Person who is a consultant or advisor,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) such individual must (A) be a natural person, and (B) provide bona fide services to the Company, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the services performed by such individual must not be in connection with the offer or sale of securities in a capital-raising transaction and must not directly or indirectly promote or maintain a market for the Companys securities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An employee on leave of absence may be an Eligible Person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (o) Exchange Act means the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended from time to time, including the guidance, rules and regulations promulgated thereunder and successor provisions, guidance, rules and regulations thereto.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (p) Fair Market Value means, as of any specified date,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) if the Stock is listed on a national securities exchange, the mean of the high and low sales prices of the Stock, as reported on the stock exchange composite tape on that date (or if no sales occur on such date, on the last preceding date on which such sales of the Stock are so reported);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) if the Stock is not traded on a national securities exchange but is traded over the counter on such date, the average between the reported high and low bid and asked prices of Stock on that date or, if the Stock is not traded on that date, the most recent date on which Stock was publicly traded preceding the specified date; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) in the event Stock is not publicly traded at the time a determination of its value is required to be made under the Plan, the amount determined by the Committee in its discretion in such manner as it deems appropriate, taking into account all factors the Committee deems appropriate, including the Nonqualified Deferred Compensation Rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notwithstanding this definition of Fair Market Value, with respect to one or more Awards types, or for any other purpose for which the Committee must determine the Fair Market Value under the Plan, the Committee may elect to choose a different measurement date or methodology for determining Fair Market Value taking into account all factors the Committee deems appropriate, including, without limitation, the Nonqualified Deferred Compensation Rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (q) Incumbent Director means
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) a member of the Board on the Effective Date; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) an individual: (A) who becomes a member of the Board after the Effective Date; (B) whose appointment or election by the Board or nomination for election by the Companys stockholders is approved or recommended by a vote of at least two-thirds of the then serving Incumbent Directors (as defined herein); and (C) whose initial assumption of service on the Board is not in connection with an actual or threatened election contest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (r) ISO means any Option intended to be and designated as an incentive stock option within the meaning of Section 422 of the Code.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (s) Nonqualified Deferred Compensation Rules means the limitations or requirements of Section 409A of the Code, as amended from time to time, including the guidance and regulations promulgated thereunder and successor provisions, guidance and regulations thereto.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (t) Nonstatutory Option means any Option that is not intended to be an ISO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (u) Option means a right, granted to an Eligible Person under Section 6(b), to purchase Stock at a specified price during specified time periods.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (v) Other Stock-Based Award means an Award granted to an Eligible Person under Section 6(h).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (w) Participant means a person who has been granted an Award under the Plan that remains outstanding, including a person who is no longer an Eligible Person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (x) Performance Award means an Award granted to an Eligible Person under Section 6(k), the grant, vesting, exercisability and/ or settlement of which (and/or the timing or amount thereof) is subject to the achievement of one or more performance goals specified by the Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (y) Prior Plans means the Companys 2011 Omnibus Stock Plan, 2009 Omnibus Stock Plan and 2000 Omnibus Stock Plan, in each case, as amended and/or restated from time to time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (z) Qualified Member means a member of the Board who is
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) a non-employee director within the meaning of Rule 16b-3(b)(3),
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) an outside director within the meaning of Section 162(m), and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) independent under the listing standards or rules of the securities exchange upon which the Stock is traded, but only to the extent such independence is required in order to take the action at issue pursuant to such standards or rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (aa)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Restricted Stock means Stock granted to an Eligible Person under Section 6(d) that is subject to certain restrictions and to a risk of forfeiture.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (bb)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Restricted Stock Unit means a right, granted to an Eligible Person under Section 6(e), to receive Stock, cash or a combination thereof at the end of a specified period (which may or may not be coterminous with the vesting schedule of the Award).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (cc) Rule 16b-3 means Rule 16b-3, promulgated by the SEC under Section 16 of the Exchange Act.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 162(m) means Section 162(m) of the Code and Treasury Regulation  1.162-27, as amended from time to time, and any other guidance and regulations promulgated thereunder and successor provisions, guidance and regulations thereto.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN
